titles.title: Of all the gifts Thy love bestows

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Of all the gifts Thy love bestows, Thou Giver of all good. E’en heav’n itself no richer knows Than Jesus and His blood.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Love devine, Thou vast abyss Our sins buried in thee, Cover'd is our unrighteousness, From all debts we are free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In Jesus blood our hearts can trace The footprints of Thy love And know the riches of Thy grace The holy righteousness.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though heart may fail and flesh decay, On firm ground we remain, When earth and heav'n shall pass away, Our anchor shall sustain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Until that day, we then shall prove, The full worth of Thy love. But here on earth, my life still needs Thy great sustaining power.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We praise Thee, and would praise Thee more, To Thee our all we owe: The precious Savior, and the power That makes Him precious too.{/lang-eng}
